# canAddPaymentPass()

**Type Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the app can add cards to Apple Pay.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func canAddPaymentPass() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the app can add cards to Apple Pay.
